verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050> Sing <WH7891> to the Lord <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song, <WH7892> And His praise <WH8416> in the congregation <WH6951> of the godly <WH2623> ones. <WH2623>
Let Israel <WH3478> be glad <WH8055> in his Maker; <WH6213> Let the sons <WH1121> of Zion <WH6726> rejoice <WH1523> in their King. <WH4428>
Let them praise <WH1984> His name <WH8034> with dancing; <WH4234> Let them sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Him with timbrel <WH8596> and lyre. <WH3658>
For the Lord <WH3068> takes <WH7521> pleasure <WH7521> in His people; <WH5971> He will beautify <WH6286> the afflicted <WH6035> ones <WH6035> with salvation. <WH3444>
Let the godly <WH2623> ones <WH2623> exult <WH5937> in glory; <WH9202> Let them sing <WH7442> for joy <WH7442> on their beds. <WH4904>
[Let] the high <WH7318> praises <WH7318> of God <WH410> [be] in their mouth, <WH1627> And a two-edged sword <WH2719> in their hand, <WH3027>
To execute <WH6213> vengeance <WH5360> on the nations, <WH1471> And punishment <WH8433> on the peoples; <WH3816>
To bind <WH631> their kings <WH4428> with chains, <WH9108> And their nobles <WH3513> with fetters <WH3525> of iron; <WH1270>
To execute <WH6213> on them the judgment <WH4941> written; <WH3789> This <WH1931> is an honor <WH1926> for all <WH3605> His godly <WH2623> ones. <WH2623> Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
